sub_title: GIS enthusiast with a desire to make this world a smaller place to live in! Constantly learning - ArcGIS, QGIS,  ERDAS, HypPy, ENVI and TSG
summary:
A performance-driven professional looking for opportunities to collaborate and contribute in a challenging environment, which will give me the opportunity to provide high-quality deliverables within the stipulated time period. Having graduated from one of the top colleges for Geographic Information System (G.I.S) and Remote Sensing (R.S), I have had the opportunity to learn from the best and work in a team with like-minded, goal-oriented personalities as well. My bachelor's degree in Geology proved to be quite vital in paving my way towards G.I.S and RS.

Software skills - HypPy, ENVI, TSG, ArcGIS, ERDAS, QGIS

school.name: Faculty of Geo-Information Science and Earth Observation (ITC) of the University of Twente

projects.title: Identifying Obstacles for City Climate Action Planning in the Cities of the South
projects.description:
1.	The topic was identifying obstacles for city climate action planning in the cities of the south (where study area was Mumbai).
2.	The study was a comparison of 'UN-Habitat', guiding principles for city climate action planning' document developed by the United Nations with 3 city climate plans of the Mumbai.
3.	This was the first research study ever done in any Indian city. No particular research can be found prior to this project

projects.title: Refectance spectra of rocks measured by ASD VS Halo Spectrometer
projects.description: The following project was undertaken at the Harz Mountains, Germany. The reflectance values of different rocks were studied and calculated.

projects.title: Optimising farmers decisions through a dynamic decision support system in Ethiopia
projects.description: Created a user interface -with the use of GIS for farmers to increase their yield per capita.

profile_positions.description: I took a leading role in test automation while improving the current automation solution at this organization. I was also the point of contact for the quality assurance team wherein I engaged in effective stakeholder management with other departments at the company.
profile_positions.title: Quality Specialist

company.name: Foro Ciudades para la Vida - Cities for Life Foro

profile_positions.company: Foro Ciudades para la Vida - Cities for Life Foro
profile_positions.description:
Foro Ciudades Para La Vida, also known as Cities for Life Forum (in English) is a Non-Governmental Organization (NGO), based in Peru, that brings together 86 civil society institutions such as universities, colleges, municipalities, private organizations and other NGO’s of the country that promote sustainable development.

During my time at the organization, performed/assisted in the following, under the guidance of Mg. Arq. Liliana Miranda Sara, who is the Executive Director of Cities for Life Foro and an IPCC AR6 lead author  - 
- Map Digitization.
- Search for journal publication.
- Support on water and territory in Lima, in-depth research.
- Participate in the organization of a series of workshops with 23 municipalities developing their climate change adaptation and mitigation plans.
- Studying the water system (in the Andes)
- Industrial Visit to Sedapal,  the largest and one of the most important public enterprise that provides drinking water and sanitation services in Peru.
profile_positions.title: Junior Environmental Scientist (Trainee)
